title: About Us
description_short: FinVeda is an AI-driven financial intelligence platform for Indian retail investors.
description_long: FinVeda is an AI-driven financial intelligence platform designed to improve the quality of investment decisions for Indian retail investors. While existing platforms focus primarily on market access and transaction execution, FinVeda addresses the critical gap of financial wisdom and disciplined wealth execution. The platform ingests portfolio data, market signals, and user-defined financial goals to generate personalized, context-aware insights using proprietary algorithms and machine learning models. FinVeda does not merely display financial data; it transforms complex financial information into actionable intelligence that helps users understand risk exposure, portfolio alignment, and long-term wealth outcomes.
